Introduction

Joohoney is a South Korean rapper, singer-songwriter and producer Starship Entertainment. He is the main rapper of the boy group MONSTA X and a member of the project group Y TEEN, and a pre-debut member of NUBOYZ. He made his solo debut with the mini album Lights on May 22, 2023
